relevant_findings.general: well-appearing in NAD, comfortable when lying still but in pain with positional changes
relevant_findings.HEENT: NC/AT, PERRL, EOMI, sclerae anicteric, dry MM, OP clear
relevant_findings.neck: supple, no thyromegaly, no JVD, no carotid bruits
relevant_findings.lungs: CTA bilat, no r/rh/wh, good air movement, resp unlabored, no accessory muscle use
relevant_findings.heart: PMI non-displaced, RRR, no MRG, nl S1-S2
relevant_findings.abdomen: hypoactive bowel sounds, tender diffusely but worst in RLQ, no rebound/guarding
relevant_findings.extremities: WWP, no c/c/e, 2+ peripheral pulses (radials, DPs)
relevant_findings.neurological: awake, A&Ox3, CNs II-XII grossly intact, muscle strength ___ throughout, sensation grossly intact throughout
